Reviews.Title: “Awful experience !!”
Reviews.Author: shapin
Reviews.Content: First at arriving they couldn find my reservation probably because what they have is an agenda with a mess of names. I was looking forward to the ocean view from the room and actually that was the only nice thing about it. Like some other reviewer posted the ocean view rooms are located on a second floor in a dark hallway. The AC wasnt working and had to wait for more than an hour (@ 9 pm tired and looking forward to go to sleep) for the multifunctional owner, waiter, bartender cooker etc to come and "fixed it", and at the end I couldnt sleep because it never worked and it was like being inside a sauna but according to him i just had to give it like 15 min to cool, well i gave it the entired night and never did. The TV had 1 channel working and the signal wasnt good so it kept disconnecting he sttd that will go and cheked and i saw him just ignoring that and going back to the kitchen. No closet space, no place to put ur things in the bathroom, and no where to plug ur charger u have to disconnect the tv or the light that at the end because the tv wasnt working went with that choice. Anyway i was staying there for the weekend and one night was more than enough, left first thing next morning and will never go back. The Hotel needs a lot of work and for what u pay there u can get a better place!! Will add photos later

Reviews.Title: “Right on the sea.”
Reviews.Author: dgauss
Reviews.Content: Rooms with a balcony overlooking the sea. Great sunset. Rooms were very clean. The parking lot wasn't. Host was just the right amount of friendly - helpful but not overbearing. Few amenenties. Internet worked in the hallway outside the room.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: NinD438
Reviews.Content: I am glad we didn't pay too much attention to the bad reviews that were recently written about this place. Our stay was a very pleasant one. Freddy, the owner (and his wife), were very accomodating and really paid attention to the things we had asked for, e.g. we didn't bring beach towels so he had given us an extra set everyday; he set us up with a cab service as there were no rental cars because of the long holiday weekend. Ok, the rooms are not 5-star quality but if you want that then pay a hefty price and go to one of those big chain hotels! This is a family run hotel with very basic rooms. The important thing is the room was clean. The cleaning staff was there every day to clean, changed the bedsheets and towels. There were no bed bugs as reported in another review. There are mosquitos at night but of course, it's a tropical place by the beach. Maybe that would explain the bites another reviewer had mentioned! As a side note -- the food served at this hotel was excellent. Very tasty and cooked by the owners too. My boyfriend and I definitely plan go back! Nin&Jo

Reviews.Title: “Staff is nice,rooms are clean,but hotel needs some work.”
Reviews.Author: For1950
Reviews.Content: The town has great assets; Excellent public beach,restaurants,ocean views & folks are very friendly. However, the hotel needs work. The entrance is not inviting, the ocean view rooms are located on a second floor in a dark hallway.The balcony or ocean view leads to an open second floor terrace.All rooms share this area, so there is no privacy and anyone can walk up to the terrace and poke around. Not safe enough for my protection. Also pictures on the website do not reflect what you see when you get there.This is way below a Howard Johnson. For what I paid....it was a rip off!!!!

Reviews.Title: “excellent view”
Reviews.Author: luis g
Reviews.Content: I'm from San Juan Puerto Rico made â€‹â€‹a business trip to the area west I stayed in this small and spectacular hotel I recommend the site is very nice and the service is execellent as much as I could taste was the service and the view

Reviews.Title: “exceptionally warm and gracious”
Reviews.Author: Vkradio D
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for one night on our recent trip. The staff is exceptionally warm and gracious. The room was small, but very modern and confortable. I felt like we got an excellant value on a cost-to-quality metric

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular ocean views!”
Reviews.Author: vmt318
Reviews.Content: This was one of my many trips to Puerto Rico. I vacation there almost every year. Aguada is one of the most beautiful beach towns in PR. The beaches, food and locals are one of a kind. Nightlife never ends! Hotel colombus is perfectly situated on the beach. Great food at unbeatable prices, great drinks and music! Stay here and really experience the island! In driving distance to everything! Rent a car. The owner fredie is the nicest guy and will hook you up!

Reviews.Title: “I love this hotel I come back next year..”
Reviews.Author: jessieboo15
Reviews.Content: I like the view, and the profetional people .and the service and excelent food.

Reviews.Title: “Tropicall paradise”
Reviews.Author: hotelcolombus
Reviews.Content: Is a place full of history, located at the west coast of Puerto Rico very nice and clean, with the most spectacular view of the atlantic ocean. very interesting place, (the city of discover) is own and operated by its owners wich are real nice people and gives the personal touch. i really had a great time. and i like to thank the owner for his hospitality. great place.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Colombus
HotelInfo.Address: Carr# 441 KM. 1.5 Bo. Carrizales, Aguada 00602, Puerto Rico
